a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Estimated number of suicides per 100,000 people in a given population and year. Suicide deaths are
underreported in many countries due to social stigma and cultural or legal concerns. This data includes modeling
based on global suicide patterns, and includes adjustments and extrapolations that aim to account for missing
Data source: World Health Organization (2024); Our World in Data
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
